title: From Here to Eternity
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

title: Roman Holiday
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Tokyo Story
description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: The Wages of Fear
description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: Shane
description: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but the conflict between stolid settlers and ruthless cattle barons forces him to act.

title: Stalag 17
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German camp commander creates a serious rift among the remaining prisoners by suggesting he had help from an informer.

title: The Big Heat
description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

title: Ugetsu
description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in 16th century Japan.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

title: The Band Wagon
description: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

title: Julius Caesar
description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his assassination plot but they have severely underestimated Mark Antony.

title: Peter Pan
description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: The War of the Worlds
description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

title: The Wild One
description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

title: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation, where he accidentally (but good-naturedly) causes havoc.

title: I Confess
description: A priest comes under suspicion for murder, and cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

title: Niagara
description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

title: Pickup on South Street
description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

title: Mogambo
description: On a Kenyan safari, a white hunter is caught in a love triangle with a prim American socialite and a brassy showgirl.

title: How to Marry a Millionaire
description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

title: Beat the Devil
description: A quartet of international crooks are stranded in Italy while their steamer is being repaired. The Billy Dannreuther and his wife are marking time with the others when the Dannreuthers meet a British couple.

title: The Earrings of Madame de...
description: A pair of earrings sold by a complicated countess to pay debts starts a chain reaction of consequences.

title: I Vitelloni
description: Five young men linger in post-adolescent limbo, dreaming of adventure and escape from their small coastal town.

title: Sawdust and Tinsel
description: A traveling circus owner and his performer mistress deal with misery and humiliation in their personal and professional lives.

title: Summer with Monika
description: A pair of teenagers meet and fall in love, running away from their families to spend a romantic summer together on an isolated island.

title: The Naked Spur
description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two strangers who are less than trustworthy.

title: House of Wax
description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives and seeks revenge.

title: Calamity Jane
description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: It Came from Outer Space
description: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert, and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

title: The Hitch-Hiker
description: Two fishermen pick up a psychopathic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

title: The Robe
description: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

title: Lili
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: An orphaned young woman becomes part of a puppet act and forms a unique relationship with the puppeteer.

title: Hondo
description: Army scout Hondo Lane protects a woman and her son from warring Apaches in Arizona.

title: Angel Face
description: An ambulance driver becomes involved with a young woman whose family he has just saved from a gas accident, but he begins to suspect that the accident was not an accident at all.

title: Kiss Me Kate
description: Fred and Lilli are a divorced pair of actors who are brought together by Cole Porter who has written a musical version of The Taming of the Shrew.

title: Titanic
description: An unhappy married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

title: The Cruel Sea
description: The crew of a British naval vessel are forced to fight for their lives against the U-boats during the Battle of the Atlantic.

title: Genevieve
description: Two friendly rival vintage car enthusiasts participate in the annual London to Brighton car rally.

title: The Moon Is Blue
description: A young actress meets two bachelors on the observation deck of the Empire State Building and invites them back to her apartment.

title: Young Bess
description: The early life of Elizabeth I, from her childhood to her ascension to the throne.

title: Little Fugitive
description: A seven-year-old boy is tricked into believing he killed his older brother, so he runs away to Coney Island.

title: The 5,000 Fingers of Dr. T.
description: Bart Collins, a boy who hates piano lessons, dreams of a castle ruled by the piano teacher Dr. Terwilliker who forces 500 boys to practice 24/7.

title: El
description: A wealthy man falls in love with a woman and marries her, but his jealousy and paranoia soon begin to destroy their relationship.

title: Gate of Hell
description: A samurai falls in love with a married woman and will stop at nothing to possess her.

title: A Geisha
description: A young girl in Kyoto is trained to become a geisha, but learns that the life is harder than she expected.

title: All I Desire
description: A vaudeville actress returns to the husband and children she left years before.

title: Take the High Ground!
description: Two drill sergeants compete for the affections of a beautiful woman while training recruits for the Korean War.

title: Thunder Bay
description: An engineer tries to build an offshore oil drilling rig in Louisiana, facing opposition from local shrimp fishermen.

title: By the Light of the Silvery Moon
description: In a small Indiana town, the Winfield family deals with various problems, including their father's new job and their daughter's romance.

title: The Man Between
description: A British woman visiting post-war Berlin gets caught up in a spy ring involving her sister's husband.

title: Welcome Mr. Marshall!
description: A small Spanish village prepares to welcome American diplomats, hoping to benefit from the Marshall Plan.

title: Kansas City Confidential
description: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must find the real culprits.
